Description: Stand close to a wall and dink the ball softly against it repeatedly.
Place cones or markers in the service box and aim for them while serving.
Volley with a partner at the kitchen line without letting the ball drop.
Practice moving laterally and forward/backward as if playing a point.
Practice dropping the third shot from baseline into the kitchen.
Return serve and sprint to the kitchen line quickly.
Dink crosscourt with a partner to improve angle and control.
Practice hitting a soft drop then moving forward to the next position.
Keep the ball bouncing up on your paddle without dropping it.
Serve the ball then quickly return to ready position at the baseline.
